title: Icons vs Porn | with Matt Fradd
description:
Matt Fradd from Pints with Aquinas get to know each other and we discuss iconography, religious art, nudity, pornography and how Christianity has found solutions to these questions.  

You can find Matt's channel here:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClh4JeqYB1QN6f1h_bzmEng

Matt's website: 
https://pintswithaquinas.com/

My links:
Merch: https://teespring.com/stores/the-symbolic-world

Support this channel: 
https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/
patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

Clips Channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCObI9A-XPP3KD3Fc3MnzOuw

French Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnTrBkUXm4i__gcMVH2fZvw

Website and blog: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com

facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld

twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

Bitchute:  https://www.bitchute.com/channel/pageaujonathan/

Dtube: https://steemit.com/@symbolism

The unofficial facebook discussion group: 

https://www.facebook.com/groups/1989208418065298/

The outro to my videos was written by Matthew Wilkinson

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/
